scripts.copy:ssr: rimraf functions/{nuxt,index.js,nuxt.config.js} && cp -R .nuxt functions/nuxt && cp functions/dist/** functions/
scripts.copy:ssr-tmp: rimraf functions/nuxt && mkdir -p functions/nuxt && cp -R .nuxt/ functions/nuxt/
scripts.copy:client: rimraf public/** && mkdir -p public/_nuxt && cp -R .nuxt/dist/client/ public/_nuxt && cp -a app/static/. public/
